body_html:
This does seem strange I can't even get a simple invocation like this to work

sess = tf.Session()
with tf.Session() as sess:
  with tf.device(tf.DeviceSpec(device_type='GPU')):
    input = tf.constant([[1.,2.,3.,4.]], dtype=tf.complex64)
    x = tf.fft(input)
    x.eval()

body:
This does seem strange I can't even get a simple invocation like this to work

```python
sess = tf.Session()
with tf.Session() as sess:
  with tf.device(tf.DeviceSpec(device_type='GPU')):
    input = tf.constant([[1.,2.,3.,4.]], dtype=tf.complex64)
    x = tf.fft(input)
    x.eval()
```
